function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airports identified as efficient but expensive for controlling infection spread","Impact":"Increased cost of implementing infection control measures, potential for limited resources","Mitigation":"Explore alternative locations for infection control measures, prioritize funding for efficient strategies","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring systems, automated disinfection technologies","People":"Travellers, airport staff, public health officials","Owner":"Airport authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of NPIs dependent on urban planning and design","Impact":"Ineffective NPIs, increased disease transmission, potential for overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Integrate urban planning and design to support NPIs, provide guidelines for effective implementation","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure, data analytics for urban planning","People":"Urban planners, city officials, public health experts","Owner":"City governments, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Variable success of NPIs in different cities and countries","Impact":"Inconsistent containment of infections, potential for global spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Share best practices across cities and countries, develop international guidelines for NPI implementation","Technologies":"Global communication networks, real-time data analytics","People":"Public health officials, government agencies, international organizations","Owner":"Global health organizations, international partnerships"}]}
